data: Consult with the Bleeding Disorder Program prior to ordering
This product requires a Canadian Blood Services contract
Do not order PTT and Factor VIII Level if administering this product as they will be unreliable
Emicizumab (Hemlibra) - Fact Sheet for PHC sites
Must be drawn using a blunt filter needle
mg, subcutaneous, Administer over: Refer to Fact Sheet/Product Monograph, once, Patient may self-administer. Must be drawn using a blunt filter needle
mg, subcutaneous, Administer over: Refer to Fact Sheet/Product Monograph, qweek, Patient may self-administer. Must be drawn using a blunt filter needle
mg, subcutaneous, Administer over: Refer to Fact Sheet/Product Monograph,  q2week, Patient may self-administer. Must be drawn using a blunt filter needle
mg, subcutaneous, Administer over: Refer to Fact Sheet/Product Monograph,  q4week, Patient may self-administer. Must be drawn using a blunt filter needle

If the patient exhibits signs or symptoms of a Transfusion Reaction, Print Transfusion Reaction Form from FormFast and follow your transfusion reaction guideline.  Notify provider of the transfusion reaction to obtain further care instructions.
